column5: Hey Guys  Thinking of heading up to Nipp. Callendar Bay in either mid to lat Sept or early October.  Fished here plenty in the spring but never in the fall.  Anyone fish it that time of year and what are your thoughts on Sept. vs. Oct?  Much appreciated.
From what I hear...In October, the fish are cruisng the shorelines at night in hordes....
Thanks Johnny Bass, was hoping to see a few more responses before deciding.  Again much appreciated.
